channel.title: Would u like my Magic Minigame?
channel.description:
ok i still dont have an idea of a minigame of training magic but this may be the thing
1-a room where u can teleport to whit a portal. 2-If you'r in the room a text will apear 3-this text will contain a clue where the magic portal may be 4-this portal will move randomly in the area u are(magic area) 5-u need find it by reading the clue on ure screen 6-when u find it u need to tag it and the portal moves somewhere else 7-u get tokes and exp every time u tag a portal 8-u get a bonus amount of exp when tagging 10 in a row 9-tokens can be spend in the magical reward chest 10-rewards are magic armour and weapons,maybe special spells
good enof ?

item.title: Would u like my Magic Minigame?

item.description:
@analrape wrote:

[quote=“mattboy, post:7, topic:75984”]I would use it if you released,

Good ^^

Sugesstion: I would change the coordinates for a tele not make a portal, it would be a little easier for a tele and not to make a portal (thats cuz i dont know how to spawn a portal somewhere lol)[/quote]commans suck portal is mush cleaner ussefull and bugless
